        public boolean justInTimeAppendIU(inpro.incremental.unit.ChunkIU synthesisIU,
                                  inpro.incremental.unit.HesitationIU hes,
                                  IncrementalTTSUnit ttsCandidate)
        Appends synthesisIU to the currentIU if currentIU is ongoing, but finishes or relaxes within two phonemes AND synthesisIU is supposed to start at either the relax time or the end time of the currentIU.
